Bisque

Your One-Stop Destination for Bisque!
Explore our curated selection of high-quality bisque ware, perfect for studios, ceramic artists, and hobbyists alike. Whether you're working with low-fire or mid-range glazes, we offer a wide variety of Earthenware and Stoneware Bisque to suit your creative needs.

Earthenware Bisque

Fired to cone 04, our earthenware bisque is designed for use with cone 06â€“04 low-fire glazes, underglazes, and decorative finishes. Its porous white surface offers excellent glaze adhesion and vibrant color resultsâ€”ideal for painting, personalizing, and studio-ready projects.
Brands & Prefixes:

  • Chesapeake Earthenware (CCX, C, TC)

  • Mayco Earthenware (MB)

  • Duncan Oh Four Earthenware (DB)

Stoneware Bisque

Soft-fired to cone 04â€“03, stoneware bisque is intended to be glazed and fired to cone 5/6, making it oven, microwave, freezer, and dishwasher safe. With a pure white body and durable composition, itâ€™s perfect for both artistic expression and functional use.
Brands & Prefixes:

  • Chesapeake Stoneware (CXS)

  • Mayco Stoneware (SB)

No matter your firing range or artistic style, our bisque collection offers the perfect foundation to bring your ceramic visions to life.

    About Us

    Chesapeake Ceramics is a leading global supplier of ceramic art products. In business In the early 90s, as the first paint-your-own-pottery studios began to appear, Chesapeake Ceramics was the first U.S. supplier to source a full container of bisque from Italy to meet the demands of this exciting new industry.
